assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical approval was obtained from the National Medical Research & Ethics Committee (Malaysia) KKM/NIHSEC/P16-1766. Informed consent was obtained from all patients for being included in the study. This study was performed in accordance with Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000.
